content: *enjoy exquisite drape and beautiful colors with this cape crocheted in homespun soft and comfortable this project makes a wonderful garment for the changing seasons lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # l10742 skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 4 balls *lagoon* crochet hook size k-10 5 6 5 worked mainly in half_double_crochet body is worked flat slip st side edges together leaving neck opening cowl neck is worked in the round construction schematics are provided tweed stripes crochet version cowl neck poncho #l10743 1 amazing knit version cowl neck striped poncho #l10744 2 homespun thick & quick crochet version cozy cocoon poncho / cozy cowl poncho 3 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cowl-neck-poncho-l10743 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cowl-neck-striped-poncho-l10744 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cozy-cocoon-poncho---cozy-cowl-poncho
